titles.title: Supply Our Soldiers Act of 2015
To provide for free mailing privileges for personal correspondence and parcels sent to members of the Armed Forces serving on active duty in Iraq, Afghanistan, or other designated hostile fire areas.
Supply Our Soldiers Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Supply Our Soldiers Act of 2015
Directs the Department of Defense to provide for a program under which postal benefits are provided to a member of the Armed Forces who is on active duty and who is either: (1) serving in Iraq, Afghanistan, or another hostile fire area designated as eligible for hazardous duty pay; or (2) hospitalized at a military medical facility as a result of such service. Requires the postal benefits to be in the form of coupons, vouchers, or other evidence of credit to use for postal-free mailings.
Makes the benefits program applicable during FY2016-FY2021.
